snippet: Atlanta found its replacement for Michael Turner on Thursday, agreeing to terms with running back Steven Jackson, who holds the Rams’ franchise record for rushing yards.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Atlanta Falcons sign running back Steven Jackson to a three-year, $12 million contract.
lead_paragraph: Atlanta found its replacement for Michael Turner on Thursday, agreeing to terms with running back Steven Jackson, who holds the Rams’ franchise record for rushing yards.

headline.seo: Falcons Reach Three-Year Deal With Steven Jackson
headline.main: Falcons Reach Three-Year Deal With Jackson
